website_summaries.verdict: Its sturdy design, ability to swap from cart to dolly as you need, and hefty weight limit make it a great deal if you plan on regularly moving large and heavy objects.
pros: Easy to turn into a dolly and back into a cart
Highly maneuverable, thanks to its telescoping handle which helps you turn it even in narrow spaces
cons: Only available in green, and a bit pricey

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Product Better Than Expected
customer_reviews.text: Better than expected. It is made very well. Welds are solid. Everything in great order. More useful than thought it would be. Very heavy duty and useful for even simple jobs. In itself is a heavier truck/handcart, however, very adaptable and worth every penny spent. After hunting for weeks, we are extremely pleased with this product. Thank you Harper Trucks for an excellent product!
customer_reviews.author: LindacaroL Gorby

customer_reviews.title: Possibly Good Product - No Box - Deep Scratches
customer_reviews.text: I can't find a contact email, and do not have time; yet, to return it would be a pain anyway. The product itself, I would like. It looks sturdy which is what I needed. It had no packaging at all though - no box, and there are numerous deep scratches. Sure, eventually, it will be scratched; yet, why buy NEW already scratched? I wasn't going for the rustic look. Will the deep scratches through the outer coating advance rusting?
customer_reviews.author: SRF

customer_reviews.title: It didn't break or warp so I'm pretty happy and we will use it for many years
customer_reviews.text: Used this hand truck to move a washer and dryer to my brother-in-law's house (two wheels) and to move a giant chest freezer (four wheels). It didn't break or warp so I'm pretty happy and we will use it for many years.
customer_reviews.author: Jen G.J.

customer_reviews.title: Save your back and time
customer_reviews.text: Good quality and great price, I use around the house. Its not super light, your probably not power lifting this thing over your head (not impossible just making an analogy) or anything, adding to my comment of well made good quality, its also strong. I've used it to carry furniture up my narrow stairs, a broken AC unit out to the detached garage, rolled the old stove out of way for new stove with it, and trolley heavy garbage can full of weeds and dirt from the yard. This thing is my new back saver.
customer_reviews.author: Raul's Reviews

customer_reviews.title: Good and Tough
customer_reviews.text: This hand truck is just what I was looking for. It handles everything from furniture to appliances, is adjustable, and I especially like the ability to lie it down for boxes. Just what I needed.
customer_reviews.author: Patti Lee

customer_reviews.title: Solid Cart.  Good Bang for the Buck.
customer_reviews.text: I was having a 275 pound package delivered and needed something to haul it, in addition to other regular utility needs. This arrived in a large box with plenty of bubble wrap so as not to scratch the paint. It handled the 275 pound package with ease, and I have no doubts that it could handle its full 700 pound rated load. It is well built with strong cotter pins to hold the handle. I am a big fan of the solid rubber wheels, since previous experiences with inflated wheels left me deflated. I highly recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: HappyTexan

customer_reviews.title: Super Sturdy
customer_reviews.text: Super sturdy! Moved a 425lb safe and tons more! Might have liked all 4 tires to be the size of the larger 2. It wanted to get stuck going over bumps because of the small front wheels when in the cart position. We used this item in both positions & moved everything in a 2,900 sq ft house. The move is done, but we are still using it. Large flower pots in the yard are easy to move around.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Move your heavy items with confidence.
customer_reviews.text: This is a heavy duty hand-truck, ( or dolly if you prefer) VERY good build-quality, excellent wheels, ergonomically accurate in its leverage. Pull the 2 pins then insert the handle in the frame for 4-wheel cart usage. Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Gruntmaster

customer_reviews.title: Game changer
customer_reviews.text: We moved from one apartment to the other, but our new apartment was 2 buildings down from our old one. Far enough it would be too heavy and far to hand carry our heavy furniture, but not far enough to necessitate a U-Haul truck. So we ordered this cart. It worked great! The solid rubber wheels held up on the smooth and rough concrete. The plastic wheels got a bit chipped here and there on the rough concrete but held up to get all of our furniture over to the new place. Some of our furniture was right around 500 lbs and this cart did not bend or break under the weight.
customer_reviews.author: WatchTheShow

customer_reviews.title: Quality control is seriously lacking
customer_reviews.text: Hand truck came with parts of the frame not painted and one of the swivel wheels barely attached. I would have returned it if I hadn't needed to use it right away. The materials seem okay and the welds look good, but paint and assembly are pitiful. Also it came shipped loose in a large non-fitted rectangular cardboard box clearly not up to the task. The box was mostly crushed and torn when it arrived. My advice? Go to a store where you can look at one first to see if it's well made.
customer_reviews.author: Sponge Bob

customer_reviews.title: Arrived scuffed, but is functional
customer_reviews.text: I ordered a new hand truck, but this one has scuff marks all over it . I don't know if it was damaged during shipping/manufacturing or if I was sent a previously used unit. The green coating, whatever it is, isn't even applied fully on the bottom-most connecting metal bar. That being said, it looks and feels sturdy, and I like the solid rubber wheels, so I'll be keeping it. If it can't handle moving heavy objects, then I'll update this review
customer_reviews.author: Austin Chang

customer_reviews.title: Nice dolly/cart, terrible packaging
customer_reviews.text: This is a nice heavy duty dolly that converts to a cart. It came fully assembled. When we received it, the box was torn open at the seams, there was no packing material around the cart and one of the cotter pins that holds the handle in place was missing. There also was no product information or warranty information.
customer_reviews.author: Chase

customer_reviews.title: poor packaging
customer_reviews.text: i know its a hand truck but the powder coating was all scratched up when it arrived.... wrap it in some plastic or something. works as expected
customer_reviews.author: drew drew

customer_reviews.title: I am happy that I finally own one
customer_reviews.text: I really like this product for I always wanted to use it to move some household furnitures and appliances. It is much better than renting one or trying to self-move things about yourself. Now, we can use it to move whatever items we like in the house without much strenuous effort and no renting one either.
customer_reviews.author: Sweetshrilling Trillingsongmusic

customer_reviews.title: Great Buy
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my husband for Christmas. I figured it would make a good addition to his shop. We have both used it several times for various things. I used one day to haul a full ice chest from his shop to our house through the yard since it was too heavy for me to carry. Worked like a charm - we love it!
customer_reviews.author: Swamp Girl

customer_reviews.title: Came with broken parts
customer_reviews.text: Product came damaged with the two front plastic wheels cracked at hub. Box was fine. Can easily send me parts but can’t figure out how to do that on amazon. Don’t want to ship entire unit back because of its bulk for shipping. Other than 2 broaden caster seems like a nice product.
customer_reviews.author: Toby C Riddleberger

customer_reviews.title: Used but paid for new
customer_reviews.text: This hand truck arrived early but it had a bent cotter pin (one) and the other side had none for the handle adjustment. The loading platform was worn in the shape of something it had been used to transport and/or store. The paint had scratches in several places. The wheels were in good condition, but again they were used. That being said the tires were already inflated for us to wheel it into the garage right from the box constructed for shipment. Product is otherwise as described and works as advertised. Giving an overall 3 because I do not feel the price was a fair value for a used item with missing and damaged parts.
customer_reviews.author: Mary Kelleher

customer_reviews.title: Four stars for how it was shipped
customer_reviews.text: The product is fine except for the lift plate being slightly bent up. We believe this happened due to the dolly being delivered AS IS...no box, just a tax on the item as to where it was to be shipped. Otherwise, it works great.
customer_reviews.author: Colorado World

customer_reviews.title: THIS PRODEUCT IS GREAT..
customer_reviews.text: THIS PRODEUCT IS GREAT......I have used it numerous times. i really like how it converts from upright to horizonial.
customer_reviews.author: Jean Bean

customer_reviews.title: Best investment
customer_reviews.text: I did not want a dolly with inflatable ties because they always seem to go flat. They is why I bought this one. I love it. I got it right before buying my first house and managed to move a whole chest freezer with it, because you are able to lay it down and still wheel it around. This thing will still be ticking when I have long since passed. BUY IT!
customer_reviews.author: shelly meyer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Dolley as described.
customer_reviews.text: Arrives already assembled. The handle extends out to 62 inches for taller loads or you can use the 4 wheel option which is very handy. It is a metal frame with air up wheels. The wheels are inflated as wheel. All around exactly as described.
customer_reviews.author: Caleb

customer_reviews.title: looks like it was used already
customer_reviews.text: The dolly seems sturdy and well made, But it was scratched up with paint missing on the bottom base and also the handle- looked battered- don't know if this happened during shipping (as it doesn't come in any packaging/ box at all- comes delivered just as seen in the picture) or was it used previously
customer_reviews.author: Cathy

customer_reviews.title: Super-strong dolly! - great value!
customer_reviews.text: Super-strong dolly! Very practical and the fact that you can convert it to a cart for moving more items is a plus. Better than most other models out there that cost more money. Bought for my home move and was able to help out volunteering at church. Very cool!
customer_reviews.author: E. Ferreras

customer_reviews.title: It is what it is.
customer_reviews.text: Just got it in. Overall it feels OK. The bottom is bent a little. Tires could use a little more air. The smaller wheels make a slight squeaking sound when changing position so they could use some WD40. Changing the handle from one position to the next is a slight pain because the handle doesn't slide easily to line up the holes for the cotter pin. Other than that its a hand truck.
customer_reviews.author: M.I.K.E

customer_reviews.title: sent a broken - already returned - item
customer_reviews.text: This product came broken and had a label on it showing that it was already a defective return. It also has a note on the handle stating that the front wheels were broke. I am very disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Monica J Miller

customer_reviews.title: Nice and sturdy.
customer_reviews.text: It's a very sturdy cart - we used it for moving some heavy items, I don't know that we have found anything we don't like about it, which is great for what you pay.
customer_reviews.author: DR

customer_reviews.title: Arrived with no pin
customer_reviews.text: Probably works well, but didn’t come with a pin for handle, so petty useless out of the box. Photos shows missing pins, and what I should actually have according to stock photo.
customer_reviews.author: RD

customer_reviews.title: Great purchase
customer_reviews.text: This was a life safer during our move. It made the whole process easier, it fit the rental truck ramp, we were able to carry all the heavy items without any issues.
customer_reviews.author: Ni R.

customer_reviews.title: Does What it's Supposed To
customer_reviews.text: I really like this hand truck. On hindsight, it might have been worth a trip to Home Depot or Lowes to check out prices, but not considering price, this hand truck is awesome. It converts easily and quickly and is durable. I wish it had small rubber tires rather than the hard rubber/soft plastic that comes with it. I used it to move between places and it works fine. I did have trouble fitting it in my car with other boxes and the like first, but that problem was easily overcome by removing the pins so the handle would slide in and store better in the trunk or car.
customer_reviews.author: hiroze

customer_reviews.title: Good buy harder to find
customer_reviews.text: Had one years ago and that’s are harder to find in store fronts. Great handtruck/dolly
customer_reviews.author: Roger F.

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy!!
customer_reviews.text: No dislikes for this product. It worked perfectly for our washer and dryer, easy to fold down to put our boxes on and would definitely buy from this company again!!!
customer_reviews.author: Shawna

customer_reviews.title: No wheel bearings to speak of -- handy for light loads but don't recommend for HD use
customer_reviews.text: Metal construction seems OK. Same for the finish. But with a relatively light load, lots of wheel friction and squeaking. WD40 didn't help much. Holes in plastic wheel just seem to be mounted on a metal shaft. This unit will probably do what I want t to do but similar priced units at Home Depot may be a better deal overall. In short, if you really want to move 400 pound loads, I doubt you will be pleased with this unt.
customer_reviews.author: John F Hansen

customer_reviews.title: Great price for such quality!
customer_reviews.text: Very sturdy yet easy to maneuver. Great price for such quality!
customer_reviews.author: Joan W

customer_reviews.title: Definitely worth the money.
customer_reviews.text: Very durable, sturdy, and heavy. Better than your average hand truck.
customer_reviews.author: trae

customer_reviews.title: Boyfriend approved.
customer_reviews.text: How to review a dolly? Well, it didn't break, it hauled our appliances up 3 flights of stairs, and my boyfriend liked it. So, five stars I guess.
customer_reviews.author: Tattoo Annie

customer_reviews.title: STRONG!  used for some actual 400 lb loads--excellent
customer_reviews.text: Convertibility easily to flat dolly a definitely an advantage and it's easy to convert. Strong frame and lack of pneumatic tires means its always ready to go. Only other thing I could want is wider wheels and tires, but functioned well on my lawn anyway Good design and execution!
customer_reviews.author: Debra

customer_reviews.title: Get This Cart
customer_reviews.text: So far so good! I should have went with this kind of cart to start with (always go for the gold, when given the choice). The rubber tires definitely have a strong odor to them, but think of it this way it's the smell of new and it will eventually go away as you use it...even faster if you coat it with mud.
customer_reviews.author: CJsAGame

customer_reviews.title: Dolly was easy to convert and will do job I need/—moving my ...
customer_reviews.text: Dolly was easy to convert and will do job I need/—moving my kids out of dorm rooms. Happy with quality and how easy to use. However, It arrived in “not new” condition. Lots of scratches and quite dirty. I need to use it tomorrow or I would try to exchange. You expect new things to be in new condition.
customer_reviews.author: Mom to 3

customer_reviews.title: Hand truck - Perfect for home use
customer_reviews.text: We have been using this hand truck regularly. My hubby was skeptical about my wanting it since we do corporate events occassionally and would borrow one from a friend. He didn't realize just how useful it is around the house, no more lugging. It's conversion to a flat bed is easy and very convenient. It has withstood a lot of use in the short time we've had it - our neighbors have been borrowing it also. We highly recommend this item.
customer_reviews.author: Kees Mom

customer_reviews.title: Strong, durable
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my dad for christmas... When it arrive, it was not boxed, but VERY cushioned and taped up except for on the wheels (exposed to move the thing around easily) so, when it showed up before the holiday, I had to hide it quick! I'm used to items being delivered in boxes... The hand truck is definitely strong and durable! Very pleased with this order. I feel like it'll last a lifetime if he doesn't bang it up too bad! (which Im sure it will take a beating pretty well). We have not tried to test it's weight capacity, but I'm confident it will hold up just about anything.
customer_reviews.author: Sierrarazz

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: THIS WAS PERFECT FOR ME TO CARRY SOME HEAVY ITEMS FROM MY HOUSE TO THE MOVING TRUCK.
customer_reviews.author: AW

customer_reviews.title: Easy hauling
customer_reviews.text: I was a little worried about getting something so bulky on-line versus our local home center but I am glad we took the plunge. It was so much easier to have it delivered to our home and we had no problems with the wheels, frame, etc., arriving perfect. We have enjoyed using this for our summer yard spruce-up.
customer_reviews.author: J.Lynn

customer_reviews.title: Smaller and less controllable then what I was looking for
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for a Harper dolly identical to mine but what I got was smaller and less controllable. It was not the right one
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca Richards

customer_reviews.title: Great product for moving heavy objects from point a to point b.  Conversion design is thoughtful.
customer_reviews.text: This is a great Dolly the dual purpose really fitted my need for moving heavy boxes from anywhere to my car without having to carrying the boxes one by one. The wheels are easy to roll. Only thing can be improve is provide the same lock pin on both side so one side doesn't stick out (It doesn't really affect the usage of the dolly, just bothers me when I am seeing things uneven).
customer_reviews.author: E.Wang

customer_reviews.title: Arrived on time and worked like a charm
customer_reviews.text: Arrived on time and worked like a charm! Moved a large side by side refrigerator to a neighbors without a problem!!
customer_reviews.author: Gayle V. Bacquet

customer_reviews.title: The Harper truck arrived today. It's missing one of ...
customer_reviews.text: The Harper truck arrived today. It's missing one of the casters ( small caster, on top side in this product photo). Any way to send me one? I should be able to replace. Robby Horne
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Solid product
customer_reviews.text: Hand cart looks like its been used. Paint scratched to bare metal. I had to pick it up at the post office when its supposed to be delivered to my front door.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Heavy Duty, just don’t lose metal pins!
customer_reviews.text: I use the hand truck for coolers filled to the brim with ice, so this is definitely very helpful. May be on the more expensive side but it’s very sturdy. Just don’t lose the metal pins! Also, delivered very quickly!!
customer_reviews.author: Anonymous

customer_reviews.title: Piece of junk!
customer_reviews.text: Piece of junk. Welds broke with only 300 lb on the cart.
customer_reviews.author: SH

customer_reviews.title: I bought this for our office and now seems that this item is not a good quality item as i initially thought
customer_reviews.text: We have not used this that much, and already the front small caster right side wheel broke and cracked. I bought this for our office and now seems that this item is not a good quality item as i initially thought.
customer_reviews.author: Max Feldblyum

customer_reviews.title: Push your own cart, Bunky!
customer_reviews.text: A friend of mine has one of these. I borrowed it once, twice, yada yada, yada. "What's up with you, Kris?" he barked when I asked for the (what??) twenty-somethingth time. "Get your own damn cart! They're not that expensive." He was right-- and not because he's a blue eyed red head --- although, I admit, those qualities help immensely. I love my cart.... I don't use it much, but when I do I think of my friend. I haven't seen him for a while. Hmmmm. If I didn't own this thing, I'd have a good excuse to call. On second thought..... These
customer_reviews.author: Kristine Holmgren

customer_reviews.title: Product arrived with a broken wheel
customer_reviews.text: Product arrived with a broken wheel. Otherwise would have been happy with the purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Not Given

customer_reviews.title: My wife loves you she can use it to
customer_reviews.text: The size the versatility of it have a bigger one but I was just one more my wife loves it too
customer_reviews.author: Robin Galli

customer_reviews.title: Hand dolly
customer_reviews.text: I have a steep driveway, and so I bought this hand dolly to help carry heavy equipment to my garage that I buy. I recently naught a heavy duty house generator and this dolly worked perfectly, the adjustable bar that comes down to allow a box to sit on it is fantastic. I'm glad I bought this one, and would recommend it for anyone.
customer_reviews.author: Diana Hart 33

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: only wish it had a handle when it is used flat
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very good hand truck!
customer_reviews.text: This hand truck is great! We had to put boards on the floor of it to keep some of our equipment on it while moving. But it's a great hand truck and I highly recommend!!
customer_reviews.author: Janed

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: Sturdy and heavy wheels. Double pins on the bar for extra safety/security. Don't move extremely heavy items so can't attest for the load capacity.
customer_reviews.author: Briana

customer_reviews.title: Worked as described
customer_reviews.text: Worked as expected for loading a 26' box truck with my house.
customer_reviews.author: Honorable Integrity

customer_reviews.title: Nice hand truck
customer_reviews.text: Nice hand truck, arrived in good shape FedEx. Only problem was missing pin. So had to order replacement instead of going thru the whole customer service thing.
customer_reviews.author: Robbiejoe

customer_reviews.title: First Class Cart & Dolly
customer_reviews.text: We bought this since we were moving house on our own i.e. we had to load all our stuff onto a truck. This proved invaluable as both a cart and a dolly, moving everything from boxes to heavy furniture. Pneumatic tires ( vs. hard rubber) make a HUGE difference, especially on loading ramps. Highly recommended
customer_reviews.author: Scars to show

customer_reviews.title: it is fine. The rubber used in the wheels puts off ...
customer_reviews.text: As a two wheel truck, it is fine. The rubber used in the wheels puts off a noxious odor. I have to place it in plastic bag when not in use to keep it from violating all the items in the storage closet.
customer_reviews.author: Patrick Dial

customer_reviews.title: Great produce, low price!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this hand truck for my parents for them to use to cart around their bins when they go to craft shows. The product was exactly as it was advertised and very easy to convert from the dolly to the push cart. My parents will get great use out of it. The low price was a bonus!
customer_reviews.author: jwtsgirl

customer_reviews.title: Nice, sturdy and carries a lot without wobbling
customer_reviews.text: Nice, sturdy and carries a lot without wobbling. shipping was on time
customer_reviews.author: TEE

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Versatility & construction of the hand truck is very good.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer. rmp i have enjoyed all of Caribbean Adventure Series. The storyline hold my interes

customer_reviews.title: Very easy to change position of use and maneuver
customer_reviews.text: Extremely well made. Exceeds my expectations. Very easy to change position of use and maneuver. Wheels very sturdy and durable.
customer_reviews.author: Kathleen Lee

customer_reviews.title: Very week
customer_reviews.text: It's very week it bends very easy, I used it for three months and have to get red of it.
customer_reviews.author: Gold Coast Home Improvement, Inc.

customer_reviews.title: ok but
customer_reviews.text: It was good while it lasted. Welds starting to break on the vertical supports...only had it 2 years, should have lasted longer . Never reached weight capacity.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Useful piece of equipment for myriad jobs around house .
customer_reviews.text: Moved furniture from I House to another. Next job will be moving washer and dryer. Some jobs only need 1 person.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It really makes moving heavy loads much easier
customer_reviews.text: Like the fact you can use two ways, upright or on 4 wheels
customer_reviews.author: Janie Jordan

customer_reviews.title: well made
customer_reviews.text: Well made cart. Converts quickly to 4 wheel cart. Fair price. Fast shipping with Prime. Gets the job done. Crappy packaging with heavy cart in oversized box and worthless paper packaging.
customer_reviews.author: B. L. Huffman

customer_reviews.title: Good quality.  Tires do smell a bit.
customer_reviews.text: Good quality. Arrived in ok condition. Had a slight bend in the corner of the flat plate at the bottom but otherwise its fine. Tires kind of smell but it's ok its being used in a large warehouse so I only noticed when I took it out of the box.
customer_reviews.author: Fire Hazard

customer_reviews.title: I've been very happy with this purchase and well worth the price
customer_reviews.text: I've been very happy with this purchase and well worth the price. I do quite a bit of gardening and it seems every year things get heavier. Very sturdy and the description is accurate.
customer_reviews.author: John C

customer_reviews.title: Hubby's new favorite thing
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for moving, but it's been so convenient we just leave it in the SUV for bringing in groceries or other large purchases. It's extremely simple to convert between positions as well.
customer_reviews.author: Serenity

customer_reviews.title: Great performance and flexibility
customer_reviews.text: Great performance and flexibility. Steel construction means high weight capacity. Solid wheels work all day, every day.
customer_reviews.author: WyattOnline

customer_reviews.title: I also like that it rolls easily when used horizontally
customer_reviews.text: This handtruck help us move a washer, dryer and a heavy wood stove. It helps to use a ratchet type of tie down strap (not included but you can buy at any home store or Amazon). This truck is very solid and gives the confidence of being able to handle heavy objects. I also like that it rolls easily when used horizontally. The tires don't have any cushion, but didn't leave black marks- which was good. The only small shortcoming was a defect on the inside of one of the wheels- the plastic rim was warped, but we didn't have time to return it and it did not affect the performance.
customer_reviews.author: dalec

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: I got this for my husband, he wasn't sure he would need it when it was delivered, however he uses it all the time. Super sturdy and easy to convert.
customer_reviews.author: KJ Pitch

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what was expected
customer_reviews.text: This is a light to medium duty hand truck. We needed it to move and it worked well with many stacked boxes. I don't know if I would feel totally confident using it with a 400lb load. The wheels could be better quality. It does not steer as well as it could when using it in cart mode. For the money it is a decent hand truck and very useful.
customer_reviews.author: Areandjay

customer_reviews.title: Makes moving way easier.
customer_reviews.text: This thing is sturdy and heavy, well built, I recently moved and Geezus Christ I never enjoyed moving till I got this.
customer_reviews.author: Christopher

customer_reviews.title: Broken front wheel after 3 months
customer_reviews.text: after 3 months the front wheel broke off. 700lb my foot!
customer_reviews.author: Jonathan L.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love love this 2 wheeler...best investment for my vending business!
customer_reviews.author: Kelly Shamblin

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use
customer_reviews.text: Solid setup, i used it in our recent move and moved a bunch of large items by myself. Easy to use.
customer_reviews.author: SJ

customer_reviews.title: Saves my body
customer_reviews.text: I got this hand truck to move a freezer but it has become my go-to aid for moving or rearranging anything heavy. It's sturdy and easy to work with. Great product.
customer_reviews.author: jrjones

customer_reviews.title: Reasonable price and handy
customer_reviews.text: I got this to help me move boxes and furniture around while doing house renovations and moving. The ability to use it as a cart too is nice.
customer_reviews.author: seekerrm2233

customer_reviews.title: but it looks good n solid
customer_reviews.text: I have not used it yet, but it looks good n solid. it is what it is.
customer_reviews.author: Amazonian

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Great product, heavy duty, love that it can be used as a traditional 2 wheeled cart or as a 4 wheeled cart.
customer_reviews.author: Bethy

customer_reviews.title: Very good product
customer_reviews.text: I purchased these for work. They are durable, sturdy and easy to use. They also came at a very good price. A good investment!
customer_reviews.author: T. Mcfadden

customer_reviews.title: Good Sturdy Dolly
customer_reviews.text: This is a good sturdy heavy duty dolly. I've used it a lot and it is a really nice one.
customer_reviews.author: N. L.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great hand truck. Bought as a gift for my husband. Very sturdy - good wheels and easy to use
customer_reviews.author: Colleen

customer_reviews.title: Easy and convenient
customer_reviews.text: This works very well and it is great that Amazon delivered for free over $50 purchase. It makes moving things so much easier and it takes my dad back to the days of being a stockboy at a local cornerstore. It was a great Christmas gift for a man with a bad back. Doesn't collapse or anything, but very heavy duty.
customer_reviews.author: keep on truckin'

customer_reviews.title: How did I manage without this?
customer_reviews.text: This hand truck is super versatile as you can use it as an upright version or flat. I usually use it the flat way in my business, but I find I am lending it to myself for personal use at home as well. Do not know how I managed without it for so many years.
customer_reviews.author: terich

customer_reviews.title: solid versatile hand truck
customer_reviews.text: solid hand truck little heave which is I didn't give it 5 stars
customer_reviews.author: Pir8te

customer_reviews.title: would not recommend this product
customer_reviews.text: wheel broke with first load, would not recommend this product!
customer_reviews.author: John J Goodson

customer_reviews.title: Wheel of Trouble
customer_reviews.text: Product feels great but both of the lower wheels have broken internally so it can now only be used in the up right position. No more than 150 pounds at one time has been on the dolly so I have no idea why the wheels would suddenly crack. It's past the return deadline with Amazon so I'll see if this is covered under warranty or just get some new wheels.
customer_reviews.author: Anthony Briscoe

customer_reviews.title: Great!
customer_reviews.text: Description is accurate and no assembly required. This hand truck is smaller than a standard hand truck but better for traveling with.
customer_reviews.author: FRS

customer_reviews.title: Good buy!
customer_reviews.text: This was incredibly useful! I am so glad I got it. I needed it so when I went to my storage unit - I didn't need to use the facility's dolley. This is very handy, sturdy, and versatile. I am happy with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great truck for the price--and it came with the solid ...
customer_reviews.text: Great truck for the price--and it came with the solid wheels so I didn't have to purchase them to replace the worthless tires these usually come with...
customer_reviews.author: Mark Maxfield

customer_reviews.title: Pleased
customer_reviews.text: Very nice just as pictured and described! I bought this as a gift and have not used this item. On inspection it seems to be just what I was looking To buy! I hope he enjoys it!
customer_reviews.author: Bizlaho

customer_reviews.title: hand truck with solid wheels
customer_reviews.text: Excellent hand truck for the price, easily converts to a cart that holds a lot of stuff.
customer_reviews.author: Ciro

customer_reviews.title: TRUCKING
customer_reviews.text: PERFECT FOR HOME USE. BEING ABLE TO USE IT IN 2 POSITIONS IS GREAT. PRODUCT CAME WITH A MISSING PIECE. I CALLED MANUFACTURER AND THEY SENT A REPLACEMENT OUT IMMEDIATELY. GREAT SERVICE.
customer_reviews.author: JO A

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Product
customer_reviews.text: Fortunately, this product was exactly as it was represented on Amazon. Easy to use and to switch from upright dolly to flatbed cart. The product is extremely durable and we hope to get a lot of use out of it in the future.
customer_reviews.author: C. P. Harvey

product_meta.title: Harper Trucks 700 lb Capacity Super-Steel Convertible Hand Truck, Dual Purpose 2 Wheel Dolly and 4 Wheel Cart with 10" Flat-Free Solid Rubber Wheels
product_meta.description:
Style:Flat-Free Solid Rubber Wheels| Size Name:700 lb CapacityHarper's JEDTK1735P Super-Steel 700-Pound steel frame convertible hand truck with flat -free tires. Telescoping handle up to 62" for two wheeling the tallest of loads. 10" solid rubber and 5" durable swivel casters for easy manuverability of bulky loads. Heavy gauge base plate and wheel fenders to protect the load. Made in USA. Since 1940, Harper Trucks' mission has been to sell the highest quality products in the market. We have grown from a small, regional metal fabricator to the largest hand truck manufacturer in the world. As the world's largest manufacturer of hand trucks, Harper makes one of every three such trucks sold in the United States. Harper Trucks are manufactured in a plant of 400,000 square feet with full robotic and new composite-injection capabilities.
